verses.roman:
āra saba bhakta prabhura caraṇe paḍilā
sabā āliṅgiyā prabhu premāviṣṭa hailā

synonyms: āra saba bhakta—all the other devotees; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; caraṇe paḍilā—fell down at the lotus feet; sabā āliṅgiyā—embracing all of them; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prema-āviṣṭa—overwhelmed in ecstatic love and emotion; hailā—became.
translation: All the other devotees also came and fell down at the Lord's lotus feet. In return, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu embraced them all with great ecstatic love.
